Headline: Updated: No Trains Between Forest Park and Harlem (Forest Park Branch)
ShortDescription: Blue Line service partially resumed, remains suspended between Forest Park & Harlem (Forest Park Branch) due to track conditions.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Service on the Blue Line has partially resumed, but remains suspended between the Forest Park and Harlem (Forest Park Branch) due to track conditions.

As a result, trains are operating as follows:

  • between O'Hare and Harlem (Forest Park Branch).

Shuttle buses are available between Harlem (Forest Park Branch) and Forest Park to provide connecting service.

See station personnel for further assistance, and pay attention to announcements on trains and at stations for service information.

We are working to restore service as quickly as possible. Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Howard-bound Red Line Service Delayed near Cermak-Chinatown
ShortDescription: Howard-bound Red Line trains are standing near Cermak-Chinatown due to signal problems. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Howard-bound Red Line trains are standing near Cermak-Chinatown due to signal problems. 

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
